metadata.title: CVE-2022-47951 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in OpenStack Cinder before 19.1.2, 20.x before20.0.2, and 21.0.0; Glance before 23.0.1, 24.x before 24.1.1, and 25.0.0;and Nova before 24.1.2, 25.x before 25.0.2, and 26.0.0. By supplying aspecially created VMDK flat image that references a specific backing filepath, an authenticated user may convince systems to return a copy of thatfile's contents from the server, resulting in unauthorized access topotentially sensitive data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47951` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cinder-api - 2:12.0.10-0ubuntu2.2
cinder-backup - 2:12.0.10-0ubuntu2.2
cinder-common - 2:12.0.10-0ubuntu2.2
cinder-scheduler - 2:12.0.10-0ubuntu2.2
cinder-volume - 2:12.0.10-0ubuntu2.2
python-cinder - 2:12.0.10-0ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

nova-ajax-console-proxy - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-api - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-api-metadata - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-api-os-compute - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-api-os-volume - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-cells - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-common - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-compute - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-compute-kvm - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-compute-libvirt - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-compute-lxc - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-compute-qemu - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-compute-vmware - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-compute-xen - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-conductor - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-console - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-consoleauth - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-network - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-novncproxy - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-placement-api - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-scheduler - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-serialproxy - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-spiceproxy - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-volume - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
nova-xvpvncproxy - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
python-nova - 2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cinder package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:12.0.10-0ubuntu2.2').
nova package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:17.0.13-0ubuntu5.2').
